word_mean: 巨核细胞：骨髓中的巨细胞，细胞大并有明显的分叶核，其细胞质可释放成熟的血小板

sentence.Network_en: Methods Amouts, cytoplasm, granule and degeneration of megakaryocyte in 58 subjects with ITP were quantitatively analysed.
sentence.Network_cn: 方法对58例ITP患者巨核细胞的数量 、 细胞胞浆量 、 颗粒、退化变性进行定量比较分析.

sentence.Network_en: As the megakaryocyte matures, small fragments break off and are released into the blood stream.
sentence.Network_cn: 成熟时, 巨核细胞破裂释放小碎片至血流.

sentence.Network_en: Conclusions The morphologic changes of megakaryocyte were improtent markers for diagnosis of ITP.
sentence.Network_cn: 结论巨核细胞形态学改变是诊断ITP的重要指标.
